com.miviclin.droidengine2d.input

Class GameInputManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.input.GameInputManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnTouchListener, OnGameStateChangeListener

    public class GameInputManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements OnGameStateChangeListener, android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    Manages game input delegating event handling to the current GameStateInputManager.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Method Detail

      • onGameStateChange

        public void onGameStateChange(GameState previousGameState,
                     GameState currentGameState)
        Description copied from interface: OnGameStateChangeListener
        This method is called whenever the GameState at the top of the stack of active GameStates of the GameStateManager changes.
        Specified by:
        onGameStateChange in interface OnGameStateChangeListener
        Parameters:
        previousGameState - Previous GameState at the top of the stack or null if the stack was empty.
        currentGameState - Current GameState at the top of the stack or null if the stack is empty.
        See Also:
        GameStateManager.switchActiveGameState(int), GameStateManager.pushActiveGameState(int), GameStateManager.popActiveGameState(), GameStateManager.popActiveGameStates(int), GameStateManager.popAllActiveGameStates()

      • onTouch

        public boolean onTouch(android.view.View v,
              android.view.MotionEvent event)
        Specified by:
        onTouch in interface android.view.View.OnTouchListener

      • onKeyDown

        public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                android.view.KeyEvent event)
        This method is called from EngineActivity.onKeyDown(int, KeyEvent).
        Queues a copy of the KeyEvent in the KeyProcessor of the current GameStateInputManager for later processing.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - Key code.
        event - KeyEvent.
        Returns:
        Always returns true.

      • onKeyUp

        public boolean onKeyUp(int keyCode,
              android.view.KeyEvent event)
        This method is called from EngineActivity.onKeyUp(int, KeyEvent).
        Queues a copy of the KeyEvent in the KeyProcessor of the current GameStateInputManager for later processing.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - Key code.
        event - KeyEvent.
        Returns:
        Always returns true.
